TEXT.TITLE: UNICORP AMERICAN <UAC> ACQUISITION ADVANCES
TEXT.BODY: Unicorp American Corp said it has signed a definitive agreement for the previously-announced acquisition of Lincoln Savings Bank. The company said the transaction is still subject to regulatory approvals. Reuter
